pcdaley21: I'm not going to create a dvd file for this as it is a fake. It's X-men: Destiny - RRoD. Again this is a fake torrent but if you still want to download and burn it, creating a dvd file really super simple. 

Just create a text file and put 2 lines in it...

For XGD3 Games:
LayerBreak=2133520
NAME.iso

For regular XGD2 Games:
LayerBreak=1913760
NAME.iso

Replace NAME with the title of your iso and save as NAME.dvd. That's it. Of course older XGD2 games can be run through abgx360 and it can create the same file for you. Or you can set the LayerBreak manually in your burning software.
